Reference your telegram 7922 of 11th June.Have you now any further information to show whether request for armistice was merely ruse to gain time or prompted by sincere desire for peace, and'as to present intentions of Amir and his advisers. Are the Bolsheviks affecting the situation ? The evidence is conflicting. I shall be glad of an appreciation of these points from you.
